sentences.sContent: He cut down on coffee and cigarettes, and ate a balanced diet.
sentences.sCn: 他少喝咖啡，少抽烟，饮食均衡。

sentences.sContent: Car owners were asked to cut down travel.
sentences.sCn: 车主们被要求减少出行。

synos.tran: 削减；砍倒；杀死；删节；胜过

trans.tranOther: If you cut down on something or cut down something, you use or do less of it
